label: Code Runner
command: file="$ZED_FILENAME"; base="${file%.*}"; ext="${file##*.}"; case "$ext" in cpp) clear && g++ -std=c++23 -O2 -static -DONLINE_JUDGE -Wall -Wextra -Wconversion "$file" -o "$base" -lstdc++exp && time "./$base" ;; py) clear && python3 -u "$file" ;; js) clear && node "$file" ;; *) echo "Unsupported file type: $ext" ;; esac
